name: Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - Purple Planet
description: This amazing nail polish shifts from a green to a purple depending on the lighting and angle. Any time I've worn it when I sell it in person I sell out, it's really stunning.

name: Indie Duochrome Nail Polish Love you Forever by Black Sheep Lacquer
description:
This duochrome polish has pink, blue and purple properties.

You can see a complete review here:

http://www.kalynlord.com/black-sheep-lacquer-love-you-forever/

name: Indie Duochrome Nail Polish Badass by Black Sheep Lacquer
description:
This is my favourite nail polish. It was briefly discontinued but is now back with a different formula. I've experimented with this one a bit, but this is now the best Badass yet! 

You can read a review of Badass here and see more pictures:

http://www.kalynlord.com/black-sheep-lacquer-badass/

name: Indie Duochrome Nail Polish Blue-Yea by Black Sheep Lacquer
description:
This duochrome nail polish is a really pretty soft blue to soft pink when applied alone. When used alone you will need 3 coats to achieve opacity. One coat over black and it's a bright purple to blue to gold shifter. 

11.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.50 for a small size (5ml)

name: Your Own Custom Nail Polish
description:
I love love love making customs.

I have so much mica/glitter/colours, I can likely make what you are thinking about.

I would like to chat prior to you purchasing this, just to make sure I can do it. I don't mind ordering in glitter as long as I can use it again elsewhere! :)

My email is erin@blacksheeplacquer.com

name: Indie Duochrome Nail Polish Blink by Black Sheep Lacquer
description:
I squealed when I got these pictures back from my swatcher. I knew it was a pretty polish, but it's stunning! It a duochrome (probably a multichrome) that shifts from 2 shades of blue to purple when swatched over black. On it's own it shifts from a soft pink to a soft blue.

11.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.50 for a small size (5ml)

name: Indie Thermal Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer Enter Sandman
description:
This is a thermal nail polish. I created it with the intention of turning any nail polish into a gradient look. It goes from black when cold to clear when warm. 

All pics show 2 coats, the glitter topcoat shown is A Letter to the New York Post.

There's some weird streaking going on in one of the pics, that won't be in the final product! :)

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Indie Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer Smells Like Teen Spirit Thermal Nail Polish
description:
This is a hot/cold reactive thermal nail polish with holographic glitter.

The swatches show 3 coats. The dark blue is when cold, the light blue is when hot.

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Indie Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer Jump in the Fire Thermal Nail Polish
description:
This thermal nail polish changes colour from dark red to light red, depending on the temperature of your body. The pics show two coats, but you can get opacity at one. 

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Indie Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer Love You to Death
description: This glitter nail polish is called "Love You to Death". It's a clear glitter topper with red hearts, turquoise and multiple gold glitters. The picture shows two coats, one alone and one over black.

name: Indie Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer Surf's Up
description:
This nail polish was based off of a contest I ran this summer. This was one of the winners. I named it Surf's Up, and it's the brainchild of the Lazy Laquerista, http://thelazylaquerista.blogspot.ca

I'm so happy with the way this nail lacquer turned out! It's a white crelly base, with multiple sizes of gold & teal glitter, 3 coats to achieve opacity. 

You can read the entire review here:

http://thelazylaquerista.blogspot.ca/2013/09/black-sheep-lacquer-surfs-up-swatches.html

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Indie Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer Subway to Venus Black Light Reactive
description:
Subway to Venus is inspired by an old Red Hot Chili Peppers song. It's a deep vibrant jelly that is black light reactive. It's full of raninbow glitters. This polish makes me think of being underwater. It's a really popular nail polish when I sell in person.

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - A Letter to the New York Post
description:
This black and white nail lacquer is called "A Letter to the New York Post". It's a fantastic mix of black and white circles, hexes, & bars in a clear suspension base.. 

Thanks to Ressa of nnpolish.wordpress.com for her gorgeous swatches!

Also thanks to my friend Britney of partial to polish, you can read her review here:
http://partialtopolish.blogspot.ca/2013/07/black-sheep-lacquer-swatches-badass.html

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

name: Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - Poke Me
description:
I was being silly again when I named this nail polish. It's a pretty pink base with scattered and linear holographic glitter. One coat is good for a subtle look, 2 if you want it opaque.

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Glow Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - Get Off My Cloud
description:
This is a super fun nail polish inspired by the Rolling Stones classic tune of the same name. It's a glow base with neon glitters of multiple sizes and shapes. The glowing base can be a bit gritty, so please apply a nice top coat if this kind of thing bothers you.

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

name: Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - First Polish on the Moon Full Size
description:
This nail polish is called "First Polish on the Moon". I wasn't really thinking of music when I named this one, I was just feeling silly. It's a bright neon pink base, opaque in two coats with tiny scattered holographic glitters. The swatches are shown with 2 coats over a white OPI polish. You can read the review and see more pics here:

http://partialtopolish.blogspot.ca/2013/07/black-sheep-lacquer-swatches-hitman.html

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Unisex Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - Lateralus Full Size Holographic Top Coat
description:
I dubbed this nail polish Lateralus, inspired by a Tool song. This is a clear holographic top coat, meant to enhance your base colour. This is a linear holo, it goes on smooth. The giltter used is so tiny it can't be felt. You won't need a clear top coat, but it's always a good idea if you want your manicure to last longer. It's a 35 micron glitter, and behaves and looks just like spectraflair. 

1 coat is enough for a subtle effect, 2 coats if you want a real kick in the eyes.

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

name: Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - Black Sheep
description:
This nail polish is almost black. It has a blue green undertone to it, but at first glance you'd call it black. I love it and wear it constantly. I love it so much I named it after my store!

The swatch is shown with two coats. It will stand on it's own with one coat, but looks best with two. I've shown a mini, but this listing is for a fullsize.

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - Hitman Full Size
description:
This nail polish is a dark grey colour and has both linear & scattered holographic properties. It looks great on it's own, but even better over a dark colour, like my Black Sheep nail polish.

It's a gorgeous polish, both in the bottle and on the nail! 

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Nail Polish by Black Sheep Lacquer - Into the Void
description:
This nail lacquer is my best seller at my etsy shop. I named it "Into the Void", inspired by a song by my favourite band Nine Inch Nails. It's a clear base with scattered holographic glitter, and tiny brown & turquoise hex & square glitter. It's packed with personality and you only need one coat for it to look amazing! The swatch shows it over my Black Sheep Nail polish.

Like all of my products, this nail polish is handmade in canada and is big 5 free.

10.00 for a full size (12ml)
5.00 for a small size (5ml)

name: Nail Polish Subscription by Black Sheep Lacquer - Canadian Orders Only Free Shipping!
description:
This option is for Canadian nail polish subscription orders only, please visit my subscription page for American nail polish subscription orders.

Each month I will mail out a full size nail polish to you based on your preferences. Hate yellow? No problem, you will never get it. Detest glitter? (Not possible, but you never know) I will only send you glitter free nail polish. Change your mind? Just email and let me know, you can change your preferences at any time. You can even request specific polishes and most likely I can accommodate any requests. In your note to seller tell me a bit about your preferences/dislikes.

Your subscription box will also include an as of yet unreleased mini nail polish. You will be the first to see it each month. As an extra bonus, you will get a free hand made bath product. It could be a bath bomb, soap, lip balm, cuticle oil, or even a candle. I'm always swapping and creating and inventing new things.

Everything will come beautifully packaged and makes a fantastic gift for someone special!

You are never locked in, you can skip a month any time you'd like, or cancel your subscription at any time. I will send out an email mid month asking if you'd like to renew. If you want to skip that month, just ignore the paypal request. After 2 months of no orders I will leave you stop sending you emails. But you are free to renew at any time!

Price includes Free Shipping! :)
